resources.string:
We are a group of students at the University of Otago who completed this as part of our COSC345 Software Engineering paper.
Please note that the information used for making this app may become outdated at any time, so this may have some inaccuracies. Where info from?
GitHub link: https://github.com/harrypirrit/MaraeMaps.git
